name: Hello-world-html
tagline: Hello World Udacity FEND Intro Project
body:
### Hello World Project
Well some things just have to be done, and this is one of them when you're starting out on a new platform.

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Special thanks to the Github community 
Thank you to all the Github development community for providing such a powerful online tool for learning and creating online.  I'm really looking forward to using the power of this platform.  The templates for projects are fantastic and a nice visual touch when sharing code.  

### My Heros!
Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) foundeders of GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
